package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));
package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));
package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));
package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));
package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;

public class Read {

			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];

				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");

			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();

				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");

			}
			
		}

			}
			
		}

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

			e.printStackTrace();
		}

		}

package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();

		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {

			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){

			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");

	public static void main(String[] args) {

			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();

				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");

package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;

import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}

			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");

package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));
package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

import java.io.File;

import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();

			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");

package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));
package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

import java.io.BufferedReader;

		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();

		}

			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");

			}

package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}

			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");

package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

				threads[i].join();

				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}

				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));

		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));
package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

public class Read {

		long t = System.nanoTime();

		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();

			e.printStackTrace();
		}

		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));

				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));
package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));
package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}

			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

import java.io.BufferedReader;

import java.io.File;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}

			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();

			e.printStackTrace();
		}

		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];

			}
			
		}

package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;

import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];

				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {

				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");

package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));
package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

package com.sheebu;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

public class Read {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		long t = System.nanoTime();
		final int noOfThread =4;
		ReadersAndWritters1 readersAndWritters = new ReadersAndWritters1(noOfThread, "abc1.txt", ".");
		try {
			readersAndWritters.getFilePartPositionsAndCreateReaderAndWriter();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		RandomAccessFile[] readers =readersAndWritters.getReaders();
		RandomAccessFile[] writers = readersAndWritters.getWriters();
		Thread[] threads= new Thread[noOfThread];
		long[][] ls=readersAndWritters.getFileDivisionNumbers();
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			threads[i] = new Thread(new ReadingThread(readers[i], writers[i],ls[i][0],ls[i][1],Integer.toString(i)+ "thread"));
			threads[i].start();
		}
		
		for(int i=0;i<noOfThread;i++){
			try {
				threads[i].join();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
		System.out.println("filcopying completed and filemerging started");
		
		FileUtility1.mergeFiles1(readersAndWritters.getFiles(), new File("result.txt"));

				e.printStackTrace();
			}
			
		}
